pages.text: $(li)The Turtle Shell is a bit better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/wood_armor)Wood Helmet$(/l), Leather Helmet and $(l:patchouli:armors/snow_armor)Snow Helmet$(/l).$(br)$(li)This helmet does not give you any special effect.
